body_html:
@bingo619 thanks for reporting this and helping reproduce.

Can you try and add this to the root CMakeLists.txt around line 162?

if(APPLE)
  set(CMAKE_FIND_FRAMEWORK LAST)
  set(CMAKE_FIND_APPBUNDLE LAST)
endif()

You'll then want to run rm -rf build to clear the directory and try again.

body:
@bingo619 thanks for reporting this and helping reproduce. 

Can you try and add this to the root `CMakeLists.txt` around line 162?

```
if(APPLE)
  set(CMAKE_FIND_FRAMEWORK LAST)
  set(CMAKE_FIND_APPBUNDLE LAST)
endif()
```
You'll then want to run `rm -rf build` to clear the directory and try again.
